input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using item specifications and item specification below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Item specification:
Disney Sofia the First Sofia and Book Figurine

Item specifications:
Help Princess Sofia pass the Princess Test by helping her with her princess posture!
Roll the mini figure forward and watch her really balance a book atop her head
Also comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand and a purple backpack
Inspired by Disney Jr's Sofia the First
Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play
Ages 3 and older.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Wayne SHW50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System. Wayne SHW50-12P 1/2 hp Shallow Well Jet Pump Conventional 12 gallon Tank System. Wayne's rugged cast iron shallow well jet pump systems are designed for wells from 0 to 25 feet in depth. These pumps are designed for continuous duty and are great for tanks up to 12 gallons. Wayne's high efficiency motor is designed for dual voltage (120/240 V) operation and features a dedicated priming port for easy filling. The included pressure switch is pre-set at 30-50 psi for automatic operation. Wayne SWS50-12P is a 1/2 hp cast iron shallow well jet pump conventional tank system with 12 gallon horizontal tank.
input_text.Response B: This Disney Sofia the First figurine helps Princess Sofia pass the Princess Test by helping her with her princess posture! Roll the mini figure forward and watch her really balance a book atop her head. This fun toy also comes with a book she can "hold" in her hand and a purple backpack. Collect all the dolls in the assortment to build a world of imaginative play. This figurine is intended for ages 3 and older.

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
